name: Bruno Design System
description:
Creating this design system helped me to have a simpler workflow, also to create better design practices that not only benefit me as a designer but also benefit my collaborators to better understand my designs and as a result save time in implementing or creating solutions. 


The development of this design system was totally based on the best practices that the good Javier 'Simon' Cuello created and that you can check here also in his page [https://goodpractices.design/]


I share with you my figma file where I keep my design system in case you want to clone it. My design is very standard as I plan to use it for future projects and not in one in particular, so you will have no problem to customize or scale it.
